actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt certain private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees.

summary.text: Exempts private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night, or on Sunday or a holiday, from the provisions under the Tariff Act requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1451)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 so as to exempt certain private aircraft entering or departing from the United States and Canada at night or on Sunday or a holiday from provisions requiring payment to the United States for overtime services of customs officers and employees.
